import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{createChart}from'lightweight-charts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ChartTest(){const chartContainerRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(!chartContainerRef.current)return;const chart=createChart(chartContainerRef.current,{width:800,height:400,layout:{background:{color:'#222'},textColor:'#DDD'},grid:{vertLines:{color:'#444'},horzLines:{color:'#444'}}});const candlestickSeries=chart.addCandlestickSeries({upColor:'#26a69a',downColor:'#ef5350',borderVisible:false,wickUpColor:'#26a69a',wickDownColor:'#ef5350'});// Simple test data
const data=[{time:'2023-01-01',open:100,high:110,low:95,close:105},{time:'2023-01-02',open:105,high:115,low:100,close:110},{time:'2023-01-03',open:110,high:120,low:105,close:108},{time:'2023-01-04',open:108,high:112,low:102,close:106},{time:'2023-01-05',open:106,high:116,low:104,close:114}];candlestickSeries.setData(data);chart.timeScale().fitContent();return()=>{chart.remove();};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'50px',background:'#000',minHeight:'100vh'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{color:'#FFF'},children:"Chart Test - If you see candles below, the library works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:chartContainerRef,style:{marginTop:'20px'}})]});}
